description:
Take notes easily without opening any unnecessary applications.

For Best Results, hide desktop icons. 
Right Click on Desktop -> View -> Show Desktop Icons

You may have to unsubscribe and resubscribe to view the newest update!

Contribute on Github!
https://github.com/braydenwerner/Whiteboard-Desktop-Wallpaper

Updated 4/20/21
- Added a lock feature to disable pen usage when specified.
- Added a color picker
- Improved UI and added light theme
- Fixed bug with eraser and selector tool
- Other general improvements

Todo:
- Performance Updates
- Delete Page Button
title: EZ Notes - A Whiteboard Wallpaper Tool
